artist: Designer: Walter Dorwin Teague; Manufacturer: Taylor, Smith & Taylor, East Liverpool, Ohio
creditline: Gift of Christopher Monkhouse in honor of Sam and Patty McCullough
description: rectangular with rounded edges and corners; grey and mustard yellow bird at center; green, rust and grey rings and grey zigzag around rim
markings: \'TAYLOR SMITH TAYLOR/U.S.A./250/CONVERSATION/4/DESIGN BY/WALTER DORWIN TEAGUE\', in black, on bottom
title: Platter
